body_content.explanation: able to use one language well:
examples: He acknowledged there were no monolingual Gaelic speakers left in Scotland.
Monolingual children are able to learn a second language quickly if given the chance.

body_content.explanation: (of a group or place) using one language as the main language:
examples: Most of the children were being raised in monolingual, English-speaking households.
Groups of children living in a monolingual environment were compared with children living in a bilingual environment.

body_content.explanation: written, created, or done using only one language:
examples: Only monolingual English sentences were used and mixed Korean and English utterances were excluded from the analysis.
